alert.note: Alert for Lexington; Richland (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 26 at 5:52PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Lexington and west central Richland Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 551 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Ballentine, or 7 miles northwest of Highway 6 at Lake Murray Dam, moving southeast at 10 mph. ...Boaters on Lake Murray Should Seek Safe Harbor... HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Columbia, Lexington, Irmo, St. Andrews, Highway 6 at Lake Murray Dam, Red Bank, Oak Grove, Ballentine, Columbia International University, Harbison State Forest, Chapin, Seven Oaks, Lighthouse Marina, Lake Murray Marina, Shull Island, Bundrick Island, Putnam`s Landing, Siesta Cove Marina, White Rock, and Rocky Point Recreation Area. This includes the following highways... Interstate 126 near mile marker 0. Interstate 20 in South Carolina between mile markers 50 and 65. Interstate 26 between mile markers 91 and 107. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
